Blog.post: I'M SUPER DUPER HYPER VERY MEGA UNBEARABLY BORED !!! This must be the boredest day of my life. ARHG. Haha. A Child's Hope ||: Will tiansong be better? I hope so...

Alright alright! Poki, the blog is finally here, as you say it. Hehe. Eddie and Jen went to KelKel's party. Why i not invited?! NO FAIR!!!! Lol. Haha. V long nv blog le. Hmm.....lemme count how many days. 1...2....3! Three WHOLE DAYS. No wonder my sis couldn't wait for me to blog. Haha. I'll make this blog extra long to make up for the days that a haven't blog! Malaysia was cool. We went to Desaru. Swimming was fun. Got water slide. Super fast!!! We went to the beach too. My sixth aunt helped us build a sandcastle. Or rather, a sand palaceplace!Hahaha. The sea was cOoOl~ Lol. The waves were so big it can carry me lor!!! I had a little bit of sand in my eyes and seawater in my mouth. My sis and bro made a mistake from choosing wheather to go to Desaru or not! Haha. You can guess they decieded not to go!

LOVELY DAY!! jEn AnD eDdIe came to my house!so much fun. haha. EDDIE!! U R THE ULTIMATE LOSER AT GAME OF LIFE!! U HAVEN'T DO YOUR FORFEIT!!!!!! lol. haha. anyway, when u both go liao, mom came out of toilet and ask if u all go le arh. haha. perfect timing! lol. c o m m e n t or E L S E .

yay. so excited! jen and eddie cuming tmr! YAY! hopefully we're going to have the best fun ever! hahaha. hmmm. what else to write? lol. hmm. beside jen and eddie coming over, i'm going to catch a movie too! =) my sis at chalet. if u see her online, it's my dad or mom or bro or ME. hahaha

today my cousin birthday. Sarah, huimin,jiamin came. haha. we went to playground and play. haIz. played catching. i was so out of breath!!! then jiamin said that the man sitting on the bench was watching me. i felt a little afraid. anyway, i didn't like the cake leh. coffee. eeww. haha. not good leh. in which room we want to play, that room cannot play. left the party angry and v bored. hahaha. slept in the car. woke up. no one knew i woke up. hehe.

Wah this morning super mega mega super very very bored. there i was. staring at the screen. nth to do. HAIZ...hahaha. afternoon do a favour for mommy again. returned books again. haha. my maid got me potato fritter (4 sticks) yummy! also got pancake. hehe. plan to eat it for supper.
hot day... AGAIN(sweat sweat sweat!!). haiz.going to eastpoint at simei to return books for Mommy. STUPID KEYBOARD!! fell off again... haiZ!!! take care all. =)
hey. haha. today also v hot. sweat sweat sweat AGAIN. haiz. one o clock help Mommy return books at simei eastpoint. going with my maid.haha. stupid keyboard. fell off again....

Today very hot leh. sweat sweat sweat. haha.sis went OuT. she wants me to do some recording stuff for her. -_- -.- what if i forget?! 2.30 to 3.30 channel 8. better blog here so i can check. hehe. remind me!!! my sis will kill me if i forget!!!
Bored today. haha. sis woke up late. Went swimming with her. haha. don't want write much.

Haiz.. only blogging because i'm bored bored bored!! e d d i e went cell grp. haha. i may be going cycling later. Tmr got sch. tmr cant see u guys. haha. oh well.. aiyah dunno wat to say already. sigh~ went gunbound play gb. won 2 rounds lost 1 round. haha. othing to do. bbeen online for quite long liao. sigh~~ sweat and sweat and sweat. just now raining heavily was quite cooling. now stop already. i want more rain!!! haha. okay larh. you all dun mind i do my blog a little short than its okay! urlLink http://estherhasablog.blogspot.com add this to your favourites dere so when u want to come read u can err just click away! lol

Yawnz~ haha. just finished hw. before that when marketing. haha. bought new rubber bands for sch. old one keep breaking man. summore when i go sch gotta plait my hair. then sum rubber bands suDDenly got loose and drop off!! haiZ. class monitor v fussy summore. hahahaha. tonite gonna have steamboat at home..WhEE~ hey i got 2nd place for a social studies quiz ya noe! last two questions then i got wrong. hahaha. A) What is a male peranakan called? Baba. B) What is a female peranakan called? Nonya. haha. these two sums lo. haha. sigh. tmr got sch. tmr cant go msn. tmr gonna miss u guys badly(err somedays later?). !-_-_-_-! yesterday keyboard fell off. yesterday nite enter key went wrong. now and today oso. haiz. somethin wrong with keyboard.... one day i go jen hse borrow one of her spare ones! haha. she doesnt mind and can liao lor. hehe. okay lah my blog so long!! *clicks publish post*

yay. this friday i erm no sch!! our sch that night got a musical concert. wheepee! eddie came online arnd 2 and he ask me why i here. lol. haha. anyway, one of my hw is to measure weight.-_-" haha my over here no weighing scale summore!!! oh man. grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!! half watching NKF charity show. how kind the ppl dere are! i called le. zao jiu da dian hua le. wat abt u? not looking forward to another no-msn week. plus sch!!

Remember, i promised to blog every Sunday? So here it is! Lol. School nth exciting happen recently. haha. work and recess work and recess. lol. haiz. tmr got sch! plus. monday tuesday wednesday thursday no msn which means i'm gonna miss u all. ~sigh~ four whole days. 1 24 5 = 24 = 8 + 7 = 24 = 12 9 = 24 = 16 ---------- 96 hrs no seeing ppl and for u guys no seeing me. sigh

Bad news guys.. I can't cum online.. mondAy tuesday wednesday thursday.. sigh. SOOOO won't be seeing u guys often. too bad..*shakes head* but i promise i'll blog every sunday of the week starting from nxt week. a fair deal. be sure to come online on friday saturday and sunday if u wanna see me! haha. i might wnanna see u too! if u have my sis contact i can ask her to say a few words from me to you guys
